title: [BOARDS BUG] Youtube videos in comments (except for OP) are misformatted
body:
Title says it all. Go and try it for yourself, if you don't believe me!

The text I entered for my comment:
http://gyazo.com/9883d3e99966683ccc6aa0f7ebe9c725 (attached as LoL_forums_format1.png)

How it got formatted:
http://gyazo.com/c240d1b6ec7d7549ec52ab04242e5583 (attached as LoL_forums_format2.png)

How a Youtube video is formatted if put in the body of the OP:
http://gyazo.com/ce9f6eb9048f413f7975f91de5536c2d (attached as LoL_forums_format3.png)

replies.body: Strange, it seems to be displaying properly now... I'm using Firefox with Windows 7. Maybe Firefox released an invisible micro-update at some point since I posted this thread? Or perhaps (for whatever reason) the formatting needed time to "settle" after I submitted my comment? Very bizarre. But, yeah, it seems to have fixed itself.

Testing:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TahFeqo1iiU

Two videos in the same reply:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zvC82bqjq58

Using:
Chrome 42.0.2311.135 in Windows 10

And yes. There is a need to thank me.
Bumping this post, can I get a Riot member to comment on this bug?
